term.list.item1: Upload, post, announce, or convey any words, pictures or files in any forms that are slander, insult, threatening, aggressive, indecent, obscene, untrue, illegal or violating public order or good morals.
term.list.item10: Other misconduct regarded by {name} with proper reasons.
term.list.item2: Infringe others’ reputation, privacy, business secret, trademark rights, copyrights, patent rights, other intellectual property rights, and other rights.
term.list.item3: Violate the confidentiality obligations accountable in the law, contract or agreement.
term.list.item4: Attempt to intrude the company’s server, database, crack the company’s security mechanism or other acts that jeopardize the safety or stability provided by the service of the company.
term.list.item5: Commit illegal trades or post false and crime inducing messages.
term.list.item6: Without the consent specifically authorized by the company in written form, the user is not allowed to use the resources provided by the service or website, including but not limited to graphics, words, audio and visual database, webpage design software, etc., conducting any commercial transactions, or recruiting advertisers or sponsors.
term.list.item7: Sell guns, drugs, pirated software, or other prohibited articles.
term.list.item8: Provide gambling information or induce others to gamble in any ways.
term.list.item9: Spam advertisement, spams, chain letters, illegal multilevel marketing messages, etc.
term.paragraph.condition: No matter you have registered for membership or not, when using the services provided by the company, both a member and an ordinary user should follow related laws and agree not to use the service to infringe others’ rights or commit illegal acts. These acts include but not limited to:
term.paragraph.confidentiality: The user has to use his(her) own correct, the latest, and complete data for registration. The registration information cannot be forged, untrue, impersonated, or in other similar conditions (e.g. the personal information and credit card information). Once the company discovers the abovementioned conditioned, the user qualification and rights will be rejected and his (her) membership will be suspended or terminated. Those violating related laws of R.O.C. will be legally looked into the relevant liability thereof. The user shall keep the password safe and may not leak or give the password to others. The service used by the ID number and password of the same user will be regarded as the behavior of the user and password keeper him (her) self.
term.paragraph.confidentiality2: If the user is under 7, the membership should be applied by the user’s parents or legal guardian. Members over 7 and under 20 have to ask their parents or legal guardians to read the terms and acquire their consent before applying for membership. Users under 20 have to guarantee the company that the parent’s or the legal guardian’s consent has been acquired before using the service of the website.
term.paragraph.cookie: To provide the best service for you, the website will store and access to our cookie in your computer. If you don’t accept the writing of cookie, please set up the privacy level as high in Function of the browser you are using to reject the writing of cookie. However, the site might not be able to function properly in some ways.
term.paragraph.link: The webpage provides linkages of other websites. You can click and enter other website through the links provided by the website. However, these websites are not applicable for this privacy policy. You have to refer to the privacy policies of the linkage.
term.paragraph.personalData: When you visit the website or use the functions and services provided by the website, we will ask you to provide required personal information in accordance with the quality of the service and handle and use your personal information within the scope of the specific purpose. Without your consent in written form, the website will not use your personal information for other purposes.
term.paragraph.personalData2: When you browse the website in general, the server will automatically record related paths including your IP address, the time you stay at the website, the browser you use, the data you browse and click, etc. for our reference to enhance the website service. The record is for the application within the website and will never be opened to the public.
term.paragraph.policy: The website will never provide, exchange, rent, or sell any of your personal information to other individuals, groups, private corporation, or public facilities, but this is not limited to those with legal basis or contract obligations.
term.paragraph.policy2: If {name} holds any promotional activities, the winner’s contact information you provide for the organizer will only be used for this activity, {name} will not give or sell the information for the activity directly to the third party. If {name} cooperates with the third party, by law, My Best Learn’s member website of the said third party will be asked use corresponding terms and privacy policy. {name} will do its best to protect the security of all the members’ personal information.
term.paragraph.refund1: If the course has not been watched (except for the trial unit) and the member regards the purchased course not meeting the requirements, in 7 days after the purchase (including the purchase date), the member can apply for refund through “contact with the customer server.”
term.paragraph.refund2: The refund only includes the amount of the actual expense. A coupon or credit used for the discount of the original order will not be refunded.
term.paragraph.refund3: Refund by Remittance: If you pay for the course by ATM or at a convenience store, the refund will be paid by remittance. Those accepting the refund by remittance will be charged with service fee NT$30.
term.paragraph.refund4: Refund application process: Please contact with the customer server, and you application will be handled.
term.paragraph.report: If any violation of the terms is found, please inform {name}
term.paragraph.scope: This Privacy Policy includes how this website will process the collected personal information when you visit the website. This Privacy Policy is exclusive of related links and websites other than this website and exclusive of people not commissioned by the website or not maintaining the website.
term.paragraph.suspension: The user may suspend or disrupt the service when the software and hardware of the website related to the service is under replacing, upgrading or maintenance. The company has no liability for compensating the loss of benefits directly or indirectly caused during the suspension of the company’s website service for maintenance or force majeure. If the service needs or includes software able to be downloaded, the software might be automatically updated in your device when it provides the new version or new function. Under some conditions, you can adjust the automatic update setup on your own.
term.paragraph.suspension2: When your act during using the service has any concern to violate the law or the terms, or jeopardize the rights of the company or the third party, within the scope permitted by the law, under notice or without notice, the authorization of your right to use the service will be immediately suspended or terminated permanently. In addition, the user agrees that if the use of the service is disrupted or the account is terminated and related messages and documents are closed or deleted, {name} has no liabilities for the user or any of the third parties.
term.paragraph.terms: Welcome to use {name} (hereinafter referred to as the service). In order to help you use all the services and information at the website safely, we would like to specify the privacy policy of the website for you. To protect your rights, please read all the contents of the terms carefully. When you use the service, it means you have read, understood and agreed all the contents of the terms. Besides, because {name} provides various kinds of services, some of them might include additional terms due to their special qualities. When you start using that service, it means you agree that the additional terms or related regulations are also part of the terms. {name} reserves the right to amend or change the contents of the terms anytime. It is suggested to pay attention to the amendment or change all the time. When you continue using the service after any amendment or change, it means you have read, understood, and agreed the amendment or change. If the user does not agree with the amendment of the terms made by {name}, please leave the website of {name} and stop using {name} service immediately. Also, the member should delete his (her) personal profile and cancel the membership. {name} also has the right to delete the member’s personal profile and cancel the membership. Please read the following contents carefully:
term.subtitle.confidentiality: Registration Obligation, ID Password, and Information Confidentiality
term.subtitle.link: Related outbound links of the website
term.subtitle.personalData: How is the personal information collected, handled and used
term.subtitle.policy: The policy for the personal information shared with the third party
term.title: Privacy Policy
term.title.suspension: Suspension or termination of the service
